actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Intercoastal Shipping Act, 1933, to make public the financial reports of common carriers by water in interstate commerce and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Intercoastal Shipping Act, 1933, to authorize the Interstate Commerce Commission to require annual, periodic, or special financial reports from common carriers by water in interstate commerce. Requires that such reports be preserved as public records.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Intercoastal Shipping Act, 1933, to make public the financial reports of common carriers by water in interstate commerce and for other purposes.
